message: I think this is a fair starting point. Let's split the money 60/40 in my favor.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a more even split is fair. How about 55/45 in my favor?  The money will be worth less as time goes on anyway.
Let's try a 50/50 split this time. Inflation is hurting us both, so we should be fair and agree on an equal share.
